column4: hi everyone! i just recerntly discovered ubuntu and im thinking about switching over.  i have a lot of basic questions that i couldnt find answers to on the website.  should i just start asking them here?
yes this would be agood place but ask in the chanel
I will disagree with tehbrandon  on this,   windows prog do not run on linux but you can either linux equivalents or you can try running some progs on a compatibility layer called wine or cedega
